message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to pay more than $9,000 for the product. Could we perhaps meet halfway at $9,500?
